goal: Examine the scope and extent of synthesis in contemporary science for many disciplines.
Explore conceptual and mental models for synthesis.
key resource: [The power of data synthesis to shape the future of the restoration community and capacity](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/rec.13251)

goal: Develop reporting documentation from a formal synthesis review process.
Develop a template for derived data for analyses, and complete a meta-analysis in R.
key resource: [The metafor Package: A Meta-Analysis Package for R](https://www.metafor-project.org/doku.php)

goal: Examine model outputs from meta-analyses and interpret. Identify key components.
key resource: [Meta-evaluation of meta-analysis: ten appraisal questions for biologists](https://bmcbiol.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12915-017-0357-7)

goal: A summary of the steps needed to complete summative assessment including rubrics
